### **Word clouding of crime type**
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
crime = read_csv("./Data/data_clean.csv") %>%
   group_by(primary_type) %>% 
   summarise(n_cause = n())
   set.seed(555)
   wordcloud(words = crime$primary_type, freq = crime$n_cause, scale = c(3, .8), min.freq = 1,
      max.words=200, random.order=FALSE, rot.per=0.35, 
      colors=brewer.pal(8, "Dark2"))
title( "Figure: Wordclouding of the top number of crimes during 6 years")


```
